meanings.definition: A tool used for breaking up soil.
meanings.sent1: The farmer used the raper to prepare the land for planting.
meanings.sent2: The sturdy raper made the soil ready for the seeds.
meanings.sent3: The raper was the farmer's best friend during planting season.
meanings.sent4: The raper turned the hard ground into a fertile field.
meanings.sent5: The rhythmic sound of the raper against the soil was soothing to the farmer.
